reviews.title: Worldwide Public Trust on Us
reviews.desc: See what our happy users and brand ambassadors think of us

card_01.title: I highly recommend cloudhospital for their seamless services
card_01.desc: lThe service was amazing. They were very clear and transparent about everything upfront. I felt confident. I never had to wait anywhere from start to end during my service. The support staff has been amazing in follow-up and co-ordination between the hospital, doctor and me.

card_02.title: My medical trip was seamless and satisfying
card_02.desc: From my transfers, insurance and translation services, name it anything in medical tourism, cloud hospital has nailed it and build trust in me. From start to end of my consultation and surgery, everything has been personally assisted by Mr.Kyung Kon Pong (my account manager) and very cooperative support team.

reviews.countries: Our happy patients are across the globe

how_it_works.title: How It Works
how_it_works.desc: A seamless four step process to book an appointment

card_01.title: Search
card_01.desc: Search for industry best hospitals, doctors, and deals across 32 countries and counting.

card_02.title: Pick Timeslot
card_02.desc: Choose a time-slot that is convenient for you from the available slots in a particular hospital, doctor or a deal.

card_03.title: Make Payment
card_03.desc: Select the mode and type of payment for the chosen time-slot and make the payment.

card_04.title: Appointment Booked
card_04.desc: Upon successful payment, your appointment will be booked successfully.
